attributes.review: When I opened this app, I saw that racist Cheeto  Oompa Loompa and that scared me. I will not sleep at night or any night ever again. This man is not going to make America great again, in fact, he is doing the opposite. He is racist, sexist and so many horrible things. His version of America is the old ways of slavery and inequality.
attributes.title: Rude

attributes.review: this app actually caused me to have a stroke and die but god let me come back to warn everyone. as soon as i opened the app my eyes stung and burned like a million murder hornets and then i started to shake and i died. anyways don’t download it and even supporting this man could lead to death, i mean it has before. 😘✌️ peace out
attributes.title: EW NO DONT EVEN

attributes.review: i downloaded this app with the hopes to begin my journey of spiritual awakening through the worship of our all powerful cheeto president. unfortunately this app did just the opposite of that. after waiting a painful 69 days for it to download, i was met with a disappointing result. when i opened the app i was met with a glorious picture of sir orange himself, but the app immediately crashed and deleted all of the bob the builder porn from my phone. i am deeply hurt by this and will never look in the direction of mr danold tromp ever again 👁👅👁
attributes.title: ✨interior crocodile alligator✨

attributes.review: This app took 5 days to download . And Gen-Z doesn’t go down without a fight. All apps will matter until tik tok lives matter. What’s the point of handing tik tok. Like for what. Y’all mad because the US didn’t create the app. To focused on yourself trump. You disgust me. But have a terrible day ! 😌🤢
attributes.title: This app is disgusting

attributes.review: Honestly all I can say, is that I had some pretty big expectations for this app. I was completely dissatisfied by the disorganization of this app. It also led to the crashing of my phone after using this app. Will never use it again.
attributes.title: What a disappointment

attributes.review: I tried using the app to see how the trump administration is going to help slow the spread of COVID-19 however they are more concerned with banning tiktok and kicking university students out of America. Oh the joys of 2020 :((( terrible app wish I could leave worse than one star!!
attributes.title: Doesn’t deserve one star

attributes.review: Alright so this app was #1 in news right above twitter so I was like must be a social media platform like tik tok. BOY WAS I WRONG! Instead there just this orange cheeto man everywhere and the app keep crashing. It doesn’t actually give out news so I don’t understand why it is in the news category. IF I COULD GIVE THIS APP 0 STARS I WOULD!!!
attributes.title: NOT LIKE TWITTER

attributes.review: The app doesn’t even open. I tried downloading it again and again but it just doesn’t open. I was doing political research to see what both presidential candidates have in store for the US, but this just take away from the info.
attributes.title: Bad

attributes.review: This app gave many virus to my phone and took way too long to download. The quality was very bad and the app was difficult to maneuver. I went to see this mans opinions and platform but instead it was very frustrating and did not help at all.

After reading the reviews, I had some speculation that this app would cause problems for me. However, when I purchased it and actually took the time to explore the app, the reviews made it look good!!!
attributes.title: Disappointed but not surprised ☹️
